lemma Call_lemma': assumes Call_hyp: "\<forall>q\<in>dom \<Gamma>. \<forall>Z. \<Gamma>,\<Theta>\<turnstile>\<^sub>t\<^bsub>/F\<^esub>{s. s=Z \<and> \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>Call q,Normal s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>\<notin>({Stuck} \<union> Fault ` (-F)) \<and> \<Gamma>\<turnstile>Call q\<down>Normal s \<and> ((s,q),(\<sigma>,p)) \<in> termi_call_steps \<Gamma>} (Call q) {t. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>Call q,Normal Z\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> Normal t}, {t. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>Call q,Normal Z\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> Abrupt t}" shows "\<And>Z. \<Gamma>,\<Theta> \<turnstile>\<^sub>t\<^bsub>/F\<^esub> {s. s=Z \<and> \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>c,Normal s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>\<notin>({Stuck} \<union> Fault ` (-F)) \<and> \<Gamma>\<turnstile>Call p\<down>Normal \<sigma> \<and> (\<exists>c'. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>(Call p,Normal \<sigma>) \<rightarrow>\<^sup>+ (c',Normal s) \<and> c \<in> redexes c')} c {t. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>c,Normal Z\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> Normal t}, {t. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>c,Normal Z\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> Abrupt t}"
